LanguageData.UT_DecryptAncientStack.label: decrypt ancient stack
LanguageData.UT_DecryptAncientStack.description: Decrypt ancient stacks in an attempt to repair them or acquire information from them.
LanguageData.UT_HackBiocodedThings.label: hack biocoded things
LanguageData.UT_HackBiocodedThings.description: Attempt to remove biocoding from weapons and equipment to make it usable.
LanguageData.UT_WipeFilledCorticalStack.label: wipe cortical stack
LanguageData.UT_WipeFilledCorticalStack.description: Wipe a cortical stack and remove the pawn stored on it.
LanguageData.UT_HackFilledCorticalStack.label: hack cortical stack
LanguageData.UT_HackFilledCorticalStack.description: Convert a cortical stack to the players faction.
